title: hi new gamemode suggestion
body: hi, i was playing league of legends and i had a really good idea make a gamemode where zilean can kill his own teammates with his bombs and get free money

replies.body:
hi, azamalaza, i disagree with you friend
i think it should be a gamemode with zilean and the new tristana, where they must compete
thank you for listening friend
hi, tristana was going to be in it but zilean said no and then riot lost all their money but got it back because volibear broke his foot

> [{quoted}](name=ESP Azamalaza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oKXuvh2F,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-05T18:43:49.171+0000)
>
> hi, tristana was going to be in it but zilean said no and then riot lost all their money but got it back because volibear broke his foot

oh okay. i trust your judgement so much.  riot owes you so much for this that they need to make an esp azamalzahar skin.
hi,  thank you my friend,  i will contact riot in 2 weeks time and sue them for making  workshop nunu which is a blatant copy right infringement of santa
